name: Catandice-iphoneapp
tagline: Dice rolling app for the iPhone, to be used for games like Settlers of Catan
body:
### Welcome to the Catan Dice rolling app for iPhone.
We've had a lot of fun creating and of-course testing this app!  However, there are always ways to improve.  This page is where to leave any feedback, enhancement requests or identify issues to be fixed.  

Simply create a new issue, fill in the relevant details (enough so we can pin-point the issue) and we'll get cracking on making the change!

[Create an Issue](https://github.com/CatanDice/CatanDice-iPhoneApp/issues)


Hope you enjoy using this app, and have plenty of games ahead!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
